how to lookup a DID? / how do I find a DID from a handle?
lookup DID / permanent DID / did lookup

Just replace the handle in  a link like this and you can find a permanent DID for a user, useful if they change their handle:
https://bsky.social/xrpc/com.atproto.identity.resolveHandle?handle=dcsan.xyz

How do I get more invites
Most invites are now given out through existing Bluesky users. New users get one invite every two weeks. We monitor the social graph, and give out more invites based on this
board / Public Benefit LLC / Jay Graber / Jack Dorsey / Jeremie Miller
Bluesky, the company, is a Public Benefit LLC. It is owned by Jay Graber and the Bluesky team. Jack Dorsey and Jeremie Miller serve on the board, along with Jay.
Why use invite codes? / Why use invites?
invite codes / sign-ups / why invites / why invite only
Social networks can be abused. It’s much easier to limit sign-ups than to try to retroactively clean up rampant network abuse.
moderation / automated filtering / admin actions / community labeling / filtering
three-fold: automated filtering, manual admin actions, and community labeling. Open and composable labeling will allow anyone to define and apply labels

How do I change my handle?
You can change your handle by purchasing a domain through providers like GoDaddy and updating your DNS records.
